fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill up to 2 Victims at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  During the day, players whose name you whisper to a good player become Victims the next night if the player you whispered to responded. (This effect wears off the next night)
- Players whose name was whispered to you also become Victims the next night.
- The names can be in any location in the whisper (ie: "Hey Rasen, don't visit Duwiiton, I trapped his house") would make both Rasen and Duwiiton victims.
